CustomField.description:
E2B (R2): B.1.8f.2, patientdrugindication (250AN) E2B (R2): B.1.10.8f.2, parentdrugindication (250AN)
E2B (R3): D.8.r.6b Indication (MedDRA code) E2B (R3): D.10.8.r.6b Indication (MedDRA code) Conformance: Optional, but required if D.10.8.r.6a is populated. Data Type: 8N OID: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.163 Value Allowed: Numeric
CustomField.inlineHelpText: If applicable, MedDRA terms should be used in the indication.
CustomField.label: Indication
